full_summary:
-------------------

### Research Ethics Services - Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Project Overview**
The Privy Council Office's Impact and Innovation Unit is seeking a service provider to offer independent research ethics review and expert advice in support of its behavioural science programs.

**Project Details**

* **Contract Reference Number**: cb-42-16441429
* **Solicitation Number**: 20231181
* **Amendment Number**: 8
* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-05
* **Closing Date for Tender**: 2023-11-14, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-11-30
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-03-31

**UNSPSC Codes**
* Environmental Ethics Advisory Services (77101703)

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding

**Evaluation Criteria**

The evaluation will be based on a Weighted Scoring System, assessing both Technical Merit and Price. The selection criteria will be used to determine the best value for money for the government.

**Contracting Entity**
The contracting entity is the Privy Council Office.

**Contact Information**

You may direct any questions or submissions to:

* Name: Alexia M. Proulx
* Email: [alexia.melanson-proulx@pco-bcp.gc.ca](mailto:alexia.melanson-proulx@pco-bcp.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 550-9093

**Attachments**
Please refer to the following documents for further information:

* Notice of Proposed Procurement (English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/21418/notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/21418/notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp.pdf)), Français: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/21418/avis-de-projet-de-marche-%28apm.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/21418/avis-de-projet-de-marche-%28
